label: アルカリ石灰ガラス
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
見出し読み: あるかりせっかいがらす
説明文: Glass made by mixing bicarbonate of soda and lime with colored sand and melting it.This is a special mathod of producing coloring, particularly a beautiful cobalt blue. This method was used until the eleventh century from Western Asia through Europe.
